column1: Kata Robata////Eutremancy: Divination via altered consciousness caused by a massive
column2: sudden ingestion of allyl isothiocyanate. While this compound is not psychoactive in itself
column3: the fiery experience of large quantities can be enough to briefly plunge its victim several stories downward through their own inner space. Cimmerian oracles would swallow a blend of pulverized horseradish and still-burning charcoal
column4: then weep as they coughed out the contents of their visions with smoke-painted voices. The cruelty of their prophecies increased as their mouths blackened with age.
